title: Public Holiday (Declaration) Notice, 2014
content:
7th November, 2014 Statutory Instruments 165
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 61 OF 2014
The Public Holidays Act
(Laws, Volume 15, Cap. 272)
The Public Holiday (Declaration)Notice, 2014
INEXERCISEof the powers contained in section three of the Public
Holidays Act, the following Notice is hereby issued:
1. This Notice maybe cited as the Public Holiday (Declaration) Title
Notice, 2014.
2. It is declared that Tuesday, 11th November, 2014, shall be Declation of
observed as a public holiday in view of the State funeral for the public
holiday
fifth President of the Republic of Zambia, His Excellencey, Mr.
Michael Chilufya Sata.
DR GUY L. SCOTT,
LUSAKA Acting President
4th November, 2014
[CO.101/9/1.64/9/]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka, Price K1.00 each
166 Statutory Instruments 7th November, 2014
